channel.title: fault tolerant on Lun Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in fault tolerant on Lun Jiang

item.title: Paper: Spanner as a Global Scale Database
item.description: Spanner is a globally distributed database. It provides SQL interface and relational like schema. It provides transaction feature for its scale and inspires some successors like cockroachdb and tidb

item.title: Paper: Raft Consensus Algorithm
item.description: Replicate is a common topic in distributed system, algorithms like paxos and its variants are difficult to understand, lack of details, but raft can help

item.title: Paper: Virtual Machine Fault Tolerant
item.description: replicate computation is complex, paper vmft try to introduce the work to replicate virtual machine
